backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining admin bootstrapping and role management, user profile storage, and public contact inquiry handling with AccessControl-based authorization. Includes admin-only endpoints to grant/revoke/list admins and user-facing profile and inquiry logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed frontend features: improved AdminGuard denial messaging showing the user’s Principal, and an admin UI for managing admins. Lists affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing routing, layout, auth, admin pages, hooks, utilities, styles, and configuration used across the React app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme design tokens with a gritty dirtbike-inspired OKLCH color palette and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app setting metadata, page title, and mounting the app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router routes for public and admin pages, wrapped with theme support and global toaster notifications.
Authorization wrapper that enforces admin-only access, handles login and profile setup states, and displays detailed access-denied guidance including the user’s Internet Identity Principal.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component integrating Internet Identity authentication, showing loading states and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting newly authenticated users to enter and save their display name to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/contact/InquiryS: Reusable success alert component shown after a contact inquiry is successfully submitted.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with a top navigation, routed content outlet, and a footer containing branding and external attribution links.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with active link highlighting, desktop and mobile menus, and an integrated login button.
frontend/src/config/youtube.ts: Centralizes YouTube channel configuration and provides utilities to validate, normalize, and extract a channel handle from URLs or raw input.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, handling authenticated vs anonymous access and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, status tracking, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, admin management, inquiries, and feature-related data.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeChannelVide: React Query hook that validates a YouTube channel handle and fetches channel videos with caching, retries, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base stylesheet defining global styles, CSS variables, and light/dark theme color palettes with a gritty dirtbike aesthetic.
frontend/src/lib/bikeVideoFilter.ts: Utility for filtering YouTube videos to bike-related content using keyword matching with optional allowlist and denylist overrides.
frontend/src/lib/youtube.ts: Provides a utility function to extract and validate a YouTube video ID from various URL formats or a raw ID string.
frontend/src/lib/youtubeChannelFeed.ts: Implements utilities to resolve a YouTube channel ID from a handle and fetch/parse the channel’s RSS feed to return structured video metadata without using the YouTube API.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application, setting up React Query and Internet Identity context providers before rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHomeBoxesP: Admin-only page for editing and saving the two home page feature boxes, loading existing data and persisting updates via backend mutations.
Admin-only React page that lists, views, and deletes contact inquiries using query hooks, with loading/error states, sorting by timestamp, and navigation links to other admin tools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManageAdmi: Admin-only React page for listing administrators and granting or revoking admin roles by Principal ID, with confirmation dialogs, clipboard copy, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form page with client-side validation, submission via a mutation hook, success feedback, and error handling UI.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with a hero section and two feature cards, using backend-provided feature box data when available or falling back to defaults.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Displays a list of dirtbike-related YouTube videos fetched from a channel feed, handling configuration errors, loading states, filtering, and user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL parameters from query or hash routing, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing sensitive parameters without page reloads.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, design tokens (colors, radius, fonts, shadows), animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing the current schema/version and a detailed summary of existing frontend and backend features for an Internet Computer full-stack application.
